name: Poorly Polys
description:
...A small planet with low gravity and swampy terrain. It is home to a race of tough worms with bushy moustaches. The swamps are used to grow a medicinal plant that the worms need to survive...
pg.13

Viki Johnson: Code
Dan Emmerson: Code + 2D Art
Olly Skillman-Wilson: 3D Art
Rich Jackson: Music + Sound 
Rich Tongeman: 3D Art + Animation
